main.name: Sonjah
main.description: I'm passionate about the great potential of technology, but tech is not my only passion.
main.bio: I have been a Grace Hopper Scholar, am a member of Phi Kappa Phi, and could be called a Renaissance Woman (as a techie nerd, painter, singer, apothecary-hobbyist, bibliophile, and so on).
main.contactmessage: I would love to hear from you - send me a message and I will reach back out to you soon!

education.school: Ohio University - Russ College of Engineering and Technology
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description: Having graduated Summa Cum Laude in 3 years and inducted into The Honor Society of Phi Kappa Phi,
my education at the Russ College of Engineering and Technology at Ohio University was both challenging
and highly rewarding. I was honored to also receive a Grace Hopper Celebration scholarship and other
scholarships in the department to finish my degree. My education was supplemented by acting as
a founding member of the Renaissance Engineers, working as a TA for the course "Engineering Overview,"
and learning through various internships and work positions.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Graphic Design (and Studio Art - Painting)
description: I double majored in Graphic Design and Studio Art (Painting) when I attended Marietta College. I graduated with
this degree Cum Laude and inducted into Kappi Pi (Art Honor Society). I had the honor of painting a mural that is
still able to be viewed on Butler Street in Marietta, Ohio and receiving awards for original artwork.

work.title: Technology Consultant
description: As a technology consultant with CGI, I am currently a front-end developer using React.js to provide customer-facing solutions for the client. In the previous client project, I built a Python service using Pandas and various Anaconda technologies.
The client will retrieve analysis results from two Hive tables where the output is stored.
During downtime, my team and I built a sample Angular front-end with
calls to the server side REST API.

work.title: Technology Analyst Program - Software Engineering Internship
description: Used JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and React.js for user interface components in a new empoloyee workflow
web application. Integrated with the Agile scrum team in Digital for front-end component specification development.

projects.title: OpenGL C++ Graphics Rendering of a Solar System
Android Application paired with RFID Reader
Branding Design and Style Guide
projects.category: Child care service in Memphis TN needed a new logo and branding design package.

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website from template provided by Tim Baker

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
